conclusion: Initial analysis of the problem setup and conditions for the collision.
Initial velocity of ball P is given as v_0.
Initial velocity of ball Q is zero because it starts from rest.
Conservation of momentum equation setup for elastic collision.
Substitution of known values into the conservation of momentum equation.
Derivation of Equation 1: v_{Q, final} = 4 v_0 - 4 v_{P, final}.
Conservation of kinetic energy equation setup for elastic collision.
Substitution of known values into the conservation of kinetic energy equation.
Expansion and simplification of the kinetic energy equation.
Derivation of quadratic equation in v_{P, final}.
Setup of quadratic formula to solve for v_{P, final}.
